type: purchase and commissioning of Sewage Treatment Plant units
short_summary: purchase and commissioning of 3 Sewage Treatment Plant units for 3 CCG Isle boat class vessels. Additional 2 units can be purchased and commissioned
full_summary:
### Government of Canada Tender Notice
#### F7049-230026 ISLE Class - Sewage Treatment System
#### Tender Reference Number: WS4058987768-Doc4081311267

**Amendment:** 4
**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

#### Tender Details:
- **Publication Date:** 7 September 2023
- **Tender Closing Date:** 26 September 2023, 14:00 Eastern Daylight Time
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2 October 2023
- **Expected Contract End Date:** 30 April 2025

#### Contract Overview:
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC), on behalf of the Canadian Coast Guard (CCG), is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the purchase and commissioning of 3 Sewage Treatment Plant units (with an option to purchase and commission 2 additional units) for 3 CCG Isle boat class vessels, as detailed in the Annex Requirement.

#### Supporting Documentation:
All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be received by the specified closing date. Late bids will be considered non-responsive.

#### Contact Information
For more information, please contact Kin Chow (PSPC/SPAC) at **kin.chow@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca**.

#### TBD Notice and URLs
- Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17389490?extsite=MTczODk0OTBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==
